entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Moncton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the morning then to rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
